name: @lasaths/phosphor-icons-mcp
description: Search and browse 1,400+ Phosphor icons by name, category, or tags. Generate SVGs in six weights with custom color and size, or fetch multiple icons at once. Streamline UI design with a ready-to-use catalog and quick integration guidance.

tools.name: get-icon
tools.title: Get Phosphor Icon(s)
tools.description: Retrieve one or more SVG icons from Phosphor Icons library. Provide either a single icon name or an array of names for batch retrieval. Returns SVG content with specified weight/style and optional color.

name.description: Single icon name in kebab-case (e.g., 'arrow-left', 'magnifying-glass', 'user'). Use this for a single icon, or use 'names' for multiple icons.

size.description: Icon size in pixels (sets both width and height). Default: 256

color.description: Icon color. Accepts hex codes (#000000), RGB (rgb(0,0,0)), named colors (red, blue), or 'currentColor'. Default: currentColor

names.description: Array of icon names in kebab-case (e.g., ['heart', 'star', 'user']). Use this for multiple icons, or use 'name' for a single icon. Maximum 50 icons.

weight.description: Icon weight/style. Defaults to regular. Options: thin (delicate), light (subtle), regular (balanced), bold (strong), fill (solid), duotone (two-tone)

saveDir.description: When format=png and requesting multiple icons, optional directory where PNGs will be saved.

saveToFile.description: When format=png and requesting a single icon, optional path where the PNG will be saved.

tools.name: search-icons
tools.title: Search Phosphor Icons
tools.description: Search for icons by name, category, or tags. Returns a list of matching icons.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

query.description: Search query (searches icon names, categories, and tags)

tools.name: list-categories
tools.title: List Icon Categories
tools.description: Get a list of all icon categories available in Phosphor Icons.
